insert into cibr_task_process_confirm (id, processId, libId, sampleName, initSample, sampleIndex, libIndex, createDbTime, libType, confirmIndex, peaksize, qpcr, peakDesc, libCheckResult, seqMethod, uploadSize, uploadUnit, uploadRemark, creater, createTime, updateuser, updateTime, rowIndex,currentstatu,subId) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.processid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.libid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.samplename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.initsample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sampleindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.libindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdbtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.libtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.confirmindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.peaksize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qpcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.peakdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.libcheckresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.seqmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uploadsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uploadunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uploadremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.rowindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.currentstatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.subid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update.foreach: update cibr_task_process_confirm set processId = #{record.processid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, libId = #{record.libid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sampleName = #{record.samplename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, initSample = #{record.initsample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sampleIndex = #{record.sampleindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, libIndex = #{record.libindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDbTime = #{record.createdbtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, libType = #{record.libtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirmIndex = #{record.confirmindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peaksize = #{record.peaksize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qpcr = #{record.qpcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peakDesc = #{record.peakdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, libCheckResult = #{record.libcheckresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seqMethod = #{record.seqmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploadSize = #{record.uploadsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploadUnit = #{record.uploadunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploadRemark = #{record.uploadremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{record.creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateuser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rowIndex = #{record.rowindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, currentstatu = #{record.currentstatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subId = #{record.subid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select id, processId, libId, sampleName, initSample, sampleIndex, libIndex, createDbTime, libType, confirmIndex, peaksize, qpcr, peakDesc, libCheckResult, seqMethod, uploadSize, uploadUnit, uploadRemark, creater, createTime, updateuser, updateTime, rowIndex, currentstatu, subId, (select count(1) from cibr_task_process_dismountdata dis where dis.makeId = conf.id) as disNum from cibr_task_process_confirm conf where processId='${processId}' and currentstatu = '${currentStatu}' ORDER BY disNum DESC, sampleIndex;
